          <title>
            <string language="en">Heat transfer in baking potatoes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeübertragung in den Backenkartoffeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert thermique en pommes de terre de 
traitement au four</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência de calor em batatas do baking</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scambio di calore in patate di cottura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορά θερμότητας στις πατάτες ψησίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Traspaso térmico en patatas de la hornada</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This schematic illustration shows how metal spikes speed up the cooking process by heat conduction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">baking time</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat conduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal spikes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese schematische Abbildung zeigt, wie 
Metallspitzen den kochenden Prozeß durch Hitzeübertragung 
beschleunigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration schématique montre comment 
les transitoires en métal accélèrent le processus à cuire par la 
conduction de la chaleur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração esquemática mostra como o 
metal spikes a velocidade acima do processo cozinhando pela condução
do calor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione schematica mostra come i 
punti del metallo accelerano il processo di cottura da conduzione di 
calore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η σχηματική απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς οι 
ακίδες μετάλλων επιταχύνουν τη διαδικασία μαγειρέματος από τη 
διεξαγωγή θερμότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración esquemática muestra cómo los 
puntos del metal aceleran el proceso que cocina por la conducción del
calor.</string>
          </description>
